pesticide.PPE: long-sleeved shirt and long pants; shoes and socks; waterproof gloves; chemical resistant apron when mixing or loading, cleaning up spills or equipment, or otherwise exposed to the concentrate
pesticide.trade_Name: SpeedZone® Southern EW Broadleaf Herbicide for Turf

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Avoid contact with skin or clothing. Prolonged or frequently repeated skin contact may cause allergic reactions in some individuals. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probable mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.
